medical_history.chief_complaint: Left lower quadrant and left flank pain
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Pain began the morning of presentation. Nausea present and unable to take pain medications. The patient reported no vomiting, fever, chills, or diarrhea. Constipation with last bowel movement 3 days prior; flatulence noted.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of left lung cancer resected, metastasis to brain, chemotherapy last week. Other medical history includes type 2 diabetes, hypertension, peripheral vascular disease with carotid stenosis, hyperlipidemia, history of stroke.
medical_history.family_history: Father with coronary artery disease/myocardial infarction (deceased), mother died from tuberculosis, multiple sisters with various cancers and one with congestive heart failure.
medical_history.social_history: Quit smoking after a 40 pack-year history. Lives with daughter and granddaughter, retired. No asbestos or heavy chemical exposure.
